Author: Alexbrock
credits: ashleney, sethfire: https://github.com/ArknightsAssets/ArknightsGamedata for the original data

operators.name: Lancet-2
operators.trait: Restores the HP of allies and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
operators.description: Lancet-2, Medic robot of Rhodes Island, is assigned by Engineer Closure to carry out medical assistance in the field.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She knows that she's a robot.

operators.name: Castle-3
operators.trait: Blocks 1 enemy and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
operators.description: Castle-3, Guard robot of Rhodes Island, is assigned by Engineer Closure to carry out combat duties in the field.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He knows that he's a robot.

operators.name: THRM-EX
operators.trait: Does not attack and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
operators.description: Thermal-EX (a.k.a. THRM-EX), Specialist robot of Rhodes Island, is assigned by Engineer Closure to carry out combat missions.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He knows that he's a robot.

operators.name: 'Justice Knight'
operators.trait: Attacks aerial enemies first and ignores Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
operators.description: 'Justice Knight' of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, tasked at Rhodes Island with cover fire support.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She knows that she's a robot.

operators.name: Friston-3
operators.trait: Blocks 3 enemies and ignores Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
operators.description: Rhodes Island Defender Robot Friston-3, deployed to the battlefield by Engineer Closure to participate in combat operations.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He doesn't think of himself as a robot.

operators.name: PhonoR-0
operators.trait: Attacks deal Arts damage and can inflict Elemental Damage. Not affected by Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time.
operators.description: Rhodes Island Supporter Robot PhonoR-0, deployed to the battlefield by Engineer Closure to participate in combat operations.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She knows that she's a robot.

operators.name: CONFESS-47
operators.trait: Blocks 2 enemies and ignores Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
operators.description: Laterano Confession booth "CONFESS-47", is willing to hear your confession.
operators.descriptionTagLine: It knows it is a public service.

operators.name: Yato
operators.description: Yato, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will fight on the battlefield to give the squad the upper hand.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Everyone admires how much effort she puts into training.

operators.name: Noir Corne
operators.description: Noir Corne, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide a solid defense for the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You can see him cleaning his mask carefully every day.

operators.name: Rangers
operators.description: Rangers, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, will repel enemy attacks with his longbow.
operators.descriptionTagLine: His energetic disposition conceals his age.

operators.name: Durin
operators.description: Durin, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will give the squad a tactical advantage with her Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She looks quite sleepy.

operators.name: 12F
operators.description: 12F, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide tactical aid for the squad with Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: At least he can help out with something.

operators.name: Adnachiel
operators.description: Adnachiel, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, will interrupt the enemies' attacks with his crossbow.
operators.descriptionTagLine: His halo is lower than usual, but not his accuracy.

operators.name: Fang
operators.description: Fang, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will fight on the battlefield to give the squad a tactical advantage.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She runs really fast.

operators.name: Vanilla
operators.description: Vanilla, Vanguard Operator of Blacksteel, will make way for the squad on the battlefield with her professional skills.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Don't let her know if you meet any wild animals.

operators.name: Plume
operators.trait: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
operators.description: Plume, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide reliable defense for the squad and hold back the enemy.
operators.descriptionTagLine: A guard of Laterano who looks serious all the time.

operators.name: Melantha
operators.description: Melantha, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide outstanding attack power for the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Never underestimate her blade.

operators.name: Beagle
operators.description: Beagle, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide a solid defense for the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Try to encourage her more.

operators.name: Kroos
operators.description: Kroos, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, will interrupt the enemies' attacks with her crossbow.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She is always aiming at her target.

operators.name: Lava
operators.description: Lava, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will make way for the squad with her Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Please handle her relationship with Operator Hibiscus carefully.

operators.name: Hibiscus
operators.description: Hibiscus, Medic Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide reliable medical care for the wounded.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Please handle her relationship with Operator Lava carefully.

operators.name: Ansel
operators.description: Rhodes Island Medic Operator Ansel, bringing a range of first aid solutions to the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Do your best! Hang in there, Ansel!

operators.name: Steward
operators.description: Steward, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will make way for the squad with his Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Mr. Nice Guy of Reserve Squad A4.

operators.name: Orchid
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
operators.description: Orchid, Supporter Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide support for the squad with her Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Make sure every second of her work time is recorded.

operators.name: Catapult
operators.description: Catapult, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, is an expert at dealing with large targets.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She can barely follow the Operator Regulations, but you'll never find her working overtime.

operators.name: Midnight
operators.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
operators.description: Midnight, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will dispose of enemies with his swordsmanship.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Surprisingly, he's quite skilled at fighting. Impressive.

operators.name: Popukar
operators.description: Popukar, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will use her chainsaw to drive away enemies that pose a threat to the Doctor.
operators.descriptionTagLine: A good girl when she behaves herself, but a devil when she goes out of control.

operators.name: Spot
operators.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
operators.description: Spot, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide basic medical care while defending against enemies.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He seems polite and gentle... until he opens his mouth.

operators.name: Beehunter
operators.description: Beehunter, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will beat up enemies with her fighting skills.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Boxing comes second, honey comes first.

operators.name: Jackie
operators.description: Jackie, Guard Operator, is always brimming with energy.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Watching her, you feel like all your worries could disappear without a trace.

operators.name: Beanstalk
operators.trait: This unit can designate one Tactical Point within attack range to call Reinforcements; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements
operators.description: Top specialist Metal Crab breeder Beanstalk, commanding her Metal Crab teams to guard the frontline.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Carefully examine any expense applications she submits. Once in a while, her contracts hide tiny traps.

operators.name: Haze
operators.description: Haze, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide support for the squad with her Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Nothing can get in her way.

operators.name: Gitano
operators.description: Gitano, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will draw plans for the squad with her Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Your fortune for the day is...

operators.name: Greyy
operators.description: Greyy, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will repel all enemies carefully with his Originium Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Shine out, no matter how dim your light may be.

operators.name: Click
operators.trait: Controls a Drone to deal Arts damage to an enemy; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)
operators.description: Click, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, has been shooting video footage non-stop.
operators.descriptionTagLine: If possible, hit that Like button on her work.

operators.name: Jessica
operators.description: Jessica, Sniper Operator of Blacksteel, will provide effective attack power for the squad with her professional skills.
operators.descriptionTagLine: If only she wasn't such a scaredy-cat...

operators.name: Meteor
operators.description: Meteor, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, is always ready to draw her bow.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Like a meteor, she crossed the sky and landed by your side.

operators.name: Shirayuki
operators.description: Shirayuki, bodyguard of Mrs. Fumizuki, will provide help for you under the orders of her master.
operators.descriptionTagLine: To your surprise, she always reappears out of nowhere.

operators.name: Pinecone
operators.trait: Attacks all enemies within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.
operators.description: Construction worker Pinecone, all spaced out while she gets the job done.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She looks half-asleep, but her work's laser-accurate. How does she do it?

operators.name: Scavenger
operators.description: Scavenger, executor of S.W.E.E.P, is ready for combat at any time.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She can clean everything, except her own room.

operators.name: Vigna
operators.trait: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
operators.description: Vigna, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, is ready for combat with the lance in her hands.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Playing rock 'n roll is a battlefield of its own. This is a fact that she knows well.

operators.name: Dobermann
operators.trait: Can attack enemies from range; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%
operators.description: Dobermann, Starter instructor of Rhodes Island, is always ready to offer advice on the battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You could always use the advice of a veteran.

operators.name: Matoimaru
operators.description: Matoimaru, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will wield her blade to wipe out the enemy.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Fast reactions, fast attacks, and even faster recovery.

operators.name: Frostleaf
operators.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
operators.description: Frostleaf, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will obey all your orders.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Try to become her beacon.

operators.name: Estelle
operators.description: Estelle, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, still doubts if she can help.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Please trust her capability!

operators.name: Mousse
operators.description: Mousse, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, thinks of her enemies as oversized scratching posts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: In a word, scratch.

operators.name: Gravel
operators.description: Gravel, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, will zip around the battlefield to defend the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Is she really a knight? Really?

operators.name: Jaye
operators.trait: Has reduced Redeployment Time, but DP Cost is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, 3 DP are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)
operators.description: Jaye, Specialist Operator, will use his expert knife skills to force enemies back.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He is rather terrifying when he's out there fighting.

operators.name: Rope
operators.trait: Can Shift enemies by using skills and can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
operators.description: Rope, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide assistance for the squad with her grappling hook.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Snag 'em and grab 'em! Who's next?

operators.name: Myrrh
operators.description: Myrrh, Medic Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide medical care for the squad with her herbs.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She might be sweet, but her herbs are sure bitter.

operators.name: Perfumer
operators.trait: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously
operators.description: Perfumer, manager of 'Health Garden,' will use her fragrant aromatherapy to heal the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Anyone with a pollen allergy should stay away.

operators.name: Purestream
operators.trait: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to {heal_scale:0%}
operators.description: Purestream, water treatment specialist, is working hard as always, cautious and conscientious.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She always thought that throwing coins into water to make a wish was a rather silly practice.

operators.name: Matterhorn
operators.description: Matterhorn, Defender of Karlan Trade CO.,LTD, is at your service as a Defender Operator.
operators.descriptionTagLine: The reliable shield of Kjerag.

operators.name: Cuora
operators.description: Cuora, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide reliable defense for the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Yeah, it's time to get sturdy. Real sturdy.

operators.name: Gummy
operators.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
operators.description: Gummy, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will heal her teammates while protecting them.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She whips up an absolutely scrumptious breakfast.

operators.name: Earthspirit
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
operators.description: Earthspirit, Supporter Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide reliable support on the battlefield when she's on duty.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Is she hearing things again?

operators.name: Podenco
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
operators.description: Podenco, Supporter Operator, brings a touch of floral fragrance to an otherwise tense battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Her fragrance is so soothing, enough to make people drop on the spot.

operators.name: Shaw
operators.trait: Can attack all blocked enemies and can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
operators.description: Shaw, officer of the Lungmen Fire Department, will provide various means of tactical support for everyone.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Not just a firefighter.

operators.name: Sussurro
operators.description: Sussurro, Medic of Rhodes Island, is on standby to provide first aid at the front.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She will strictly follow the operator guidelines when providing medical assistance.

operators.name: Myrtle
operators.trait: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration
operators.description: Myrtle, Vanguard of Rhodes Island, is ready to lead the charge into battle!
operators.descriptionTagLine: Maybe she should have a talk with Zima.

operators.name: Vermeil
operators.description: Vermeil, Siracusan hunter, will identify the direction of the prey in the wilderness.
operators.descriptionTagLine: When hunting, please remember to remind your teammates about where the traps are hidden.

operators.name: May
operators.description: May, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, has issued a warning to wrongdoers and is not afraid to sanction them.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Does not accept frivolous investigations and odd jobs, such as searching for lost pets.

operators.name: Ambriel
operators.trait: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with lowest DEF within range first
operators.description: Ambriel, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, has her sights on your back from somewhere you cannot see.
operators.descriptionTagLine: A well-rounded and capable sniper, as long as she doesn't doze off.

operators.name: Aciddrop
operators.description: Aciddrop, Rhodes Island Operator, is a free-spirited skateboard warrior.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Goes around in circles for a week before hitting the target.

operators.name: Cutter
operators.description: Cutter, mercenary, will complete all tasks on the battlefield in a calm and disciplined manner.
operators.descriptionTagLine: The kitchen is more dangerous than the battlefield, and it would be best to not let her in the kitchen.

operators.name: Utage
operators.trait: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers HP every time this operator attacks an enemy
operators.description: Utage, Guard Operator, is standing around on the front lines lazily.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Enemies are taken out in an absolutely terrifying manner.

operators.name: Arene
operators.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
operators.description: Vanguard Operator Arene, always taking pleasure in toying with his enemies on the field.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Don't come too close. It's dangerous.

operators.name: Bubble
operators.description: Defender Operator Bubble isn't scared of anything.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Well, she's a little scared of getting yelled at.

operators.name: Whisperain
operators.trait: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to {heal_scale:0%}
operators.description: Whisperain, roving doctor, journeys gentle and lonely with us.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Come closer to her, and do not be afraid.

operators.name: Projekt Red
operators.description: Projekt Red the Wolf Hunter, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, will join the hunt.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Her blades are her fangs.

operators.name: Waai Fu
operators.description: Waai Fu, intern Operator from Lungmen, received high marks in the comprehensive entrance examination.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Will never admit that she's the first hero of justice to graduate from her university.

operators.name: Kafka
operators.description: Gardener Kafka, with a skip and a hop.
operators.descriptionTagLine: When she laughs, something wicked this way comes.

operators.name: Iris
operators.trait: Attacks deal Arts damage; When unable to find a target, attacks can be stored up and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)
operators.description: Master of the Castle Iris, giving her utmost to grant all children sweet dreams.
operators.descriptionTagLine: As a spinner of dreams, perhaps she's the one who most believes.

operators.name: Indra
operators.description: Indra, member of the Glasgow Gang, will gladly brawl with the big guys for you.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She is good at negotiating with her fists.

operators.name: Flint
operators.description: Flint, a tribal warrior, is the pure embodiment of power.
operators.descriptionTagLine: The first step towards communication starts with finding a common language.

operators.name: Vulcan
operators.description: Vulcan, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, has lit the furnace for you. She's ready to start forging at any time.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Fixing things hardly interests her. Instead, she prefers to invent stuff.

operators.name: Asbestos
operators.trait: Normal attacks deal Arts damage while the skill is active
operators.description: Asbestos, contracted explorer to Rhodes Island, is very reluctant to serve under you.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Don't read too much into things. She doesn't hate anyone, but naturally, she doesn't like anyone either.

operators.name: Ptilopsis
operators.trait: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously
operators.description: Ptilopsis, database maintainer of Rhine Lab, activated. Please enter commands to operate.

operators.name: Zima
operators.description: Zima, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will give the squad a tactical advantage with her physical strength at the start of every battle.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She always stands up for her friends, no matter what happens.

operators.name: Texas
operators.description: Texas, employee of Penguin Logistics, will give the squad a tactical advantage with her Originium Arts at the start of every battle.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You can trust her with your cargo.

operators.name: Chiave
operators.description: Chiave, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will show off his skills on the front lines.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Instead of trying to get him to follow orders, cooperating with him to deliver orders might be less stressful.

operators.name: Specter
operators.description: Specter from the Abyssal Hunters is already done with her prayer and is now prowling the battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Her madness is terrifying.

operators.name: Broca
operators.description: Broca, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, is busy defending the other Operators on the front lines.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He's not as scary as he looks.

operators.name: Blue Poison
operators.description: Blue Poison, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, will attack the enemy with her venom.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Hold her hands, and give her confidence.

operators.name: Platinum
operators.description: Platinum, member of Kazimierz Armorless Union, will provide versatile fire support on the battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: A carefree girl, and the nightmare of all knights.

operators.name: Meteorite
operators.description: Meteorite, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, is ready to pound enemies with her barrage.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She will fulfill her duties as long as she still has a weapon in her hands.

operators.name: Sesa
operators.description: Sesa, black market armament tuner, will level everything with grenades.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He really will blow things up for the sake of aesthetics.

operators.name: Executor
operators.trait: Attacks all enemies within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.
operators.description: Executor, a professional undertaker sent from the Laterano Embassy, is glad to fulfill any and all contracts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Be careful what you wish for, because he really can accomplish things that border on absurdity or impossibility.

operators.name: Aosta
operators.trait: Attacks all enemies within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.
operators.description: Aosta
operators.descriptionTagLine: If you have a problem, ask his advice.

operators.name: Mayer
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and can use Summons in battles
operators.description: Mayer, researcher of Rhine Lab, is ready for combat with her Meeboos.
operators.descriptionTagLine: A genius at multitasking in all aspects.

operators.name: Silence
operators.description: Silence, medical specialist of Rhine Lab, will make use of the latest scientific developments on the battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: There's no risk in the fruits of research, as they are only byproducts after all. Experimentation, on the other hand...

operators.name: Warfarin
operators.description: Warfarin, Medic Operator of Rhodes Island, sees the safety of her fellow Operators as her duty.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Of course, medical research is a tiny little bit more important.

operators.name: Nearl
operators.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
operators.description: Nearl, former knight of Kazimierz, is a core member on the battlefield with her defense and healing skills.
operators.descriptionTagLine: It feels relieving to have her by your side.

operators.name: Hung
operators.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
operators.description: Hung, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will protect all the Operators on the front lines.
operators.descriptionTagLine: There's no need to speculate. His fur feels very nice to the touch.

operators.name: Liskarm
operators.trait: Blocks 3 enemies and attacks from long range.
operators.description: Liskarm, Defender Operator of B.P.R.S. of Blacksteel, possesses both a solid shield and a sharp spear.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Her spear-like lightning will pierce all enemies in front of her.

operators.name: Croissant
operators.description: Croissant, special agent of Penguin Logistics, is willing to provide reliable defensive power for Rhodes Island as a Defender Operator.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Business is like a war without bullets! All the training and hard work has lead to this day!

operators.name: Provence
operators.description: Provence, Catastrophe Messenger of Rhodes Island, always keeps an eye on the movements of Catastrophes and the enemy.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She also keeps an eye on everyone's health.

operators.name: Firewatch
operators.trait: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with lowest DEF within range first
operators.description: Firewatch, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, will await your orders while undercover.
operators.descriptionTagLine: When will she smile for us? Even the faintest one...

operators.name: Andreana
operators.trait: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with lowest DEF within range first
operators.description: Andreana, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, will assist other Operators from a distance.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She's not a fan of hard work, but she'll take it seriously and get it done.

operators.name: Cliffheart
operators.trait: Can Shift enemies by using skills and can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
operators.description: Cliffheart, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, possesses both the tenacity of a climber and the sensitivity of a warrior.
operators.descriptionTagLine: It really hurts to be hit by a climbing pick.

operators.name: Pramanix
operators.description: Pramanix, Karlan Saintess, is willing to send holy blessings to you as a Supporter Operator.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She doesn't actually feel like working that much.

operators.name: Shamare
operators.description: Shamare, Rhodes Island Operator, is seen as a harbinger of evil spirits by her enemies.
operators.descriptionTagLine: It takes a long time to sew a doll, so don't blame her for being late.

operators.name: Istina
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
operators.description: Istina, member of Ursus Student Self-Governing Group, will beat the enemy with Originium Arts chosen from one of her books.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Education is the key to life's riches.

operators.name: Glaucus
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
operators.description: Glaucus, weapon reviewer of Raythean, is ready to take down enemy machines with the latest technology.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Please keep the receipt for that portable communication device.

operators.name: Manticore
operators.trait: Deals Damage to all targets within range, 50% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks, and is less likely to be targeted by enemies
operators.description: Manticore, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, will hunt down enemies silently with her scorpion tail.
operators.descriptionTagLine: I'm right here!

operators.name: FEater
operators.trait: Can attack all blocked enemies and can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
operators.description: FEater, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, will settle disputes with her excellent martial art skills.
operators.descriptionTagLine: No stand-in, NO.

operators.name: Nightmare
operators.description: Nightmare, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide help with her Originium Arts, no matter which personality is in at the moment.
operators.descriptionTagLine: I'm not quite sure who's standing in front of me.

operators.name: Swire
operators.trait: Can attack enemies from range; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%
operators.description: Swire, Guard Operator from Lungmen, will provide professional police assistance and extra training for you.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Sure enough, the pride of Lungmen comes from the prosperity of its commerce, trades and capital flows!

operators.name: Astesia
operators.description: Astesia, Guard of Rhodes Island, has summoned the power of the stars to hold the line.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She is the boundless starry skies, as well as your personal alarm clock.

operators.name: GreyThroat
operators.description: GreyThroat, Sniper Operator of Rhodes Island, brings eternal peace with each of her steady shots.
operators.descriptionTagLine: If you're ever on the receiving end of her evil eye, it's not necessarily meant for you.

operators.name: Reed
operators.trait: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
operators.description: Reed, Rhodes Island inpatient, will provide personal assistance to those who are trustworthy.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Using her is more dangerous than protecting her.

operators.name: Leizi
operators.trait: Attacks deal Arts damage and jump between 3 enemies. Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts a brief Slow
operators.description: Leizi, judicial officer from the Central Judicial Office, will cooperate with Rhodes Island for a few operations.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Have I seen you before somewhere?

operators.name: Elysium
operators.trait: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration
operators.description: Elysium, Vanguard Operator, ensures that operations proceed smoothly by providing stable battlefield communications.
operators.descriptionTagLine: The flag isn't a weapon. It'll cost a lot to replace if it gets broken.

operators.name: Tsukinogi
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage; When skill is active, attacks instead restore the HP of allies (heal amount is equal to 75% of ATK)
operators.description: Tsukinogi, former Catastrophe Messenger from Higashi, is supporting the Doctor in controlling the flow of battle.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Good at persuading others, but won't work with you.

operators.name: Leonhardt
operators.description: Leonhardt, Catastrophe Messenger, is your go-to guy for when you need a difficult obstacle crushed.
operators.descriptionTagLine: It is forbidden to bring him a pile of rocks and ask him to identify them.

operators.name: Ayerscarpe
operators.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
operators.description: Ayerscarpe, Messenger Bodyguard, will provide support in accordance with the terms of his contract.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Actual performance far exceeds what is stipulated in the contract.

operators.name: Beeswax
operators.trait: Normally does not attack, but has greatly increased DEF and RES; When skill is active, attacks deal AoE Arts damage
operators.description: Beeswax, shaman priestess from the Sargon Desert, brings her blessings from the golden sands.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Allowing one to touch the horns is a symbol of intimacy, trust, and respect between the two parties.

operators.name: April
operators.description: Rhodes Island Operator April, always in a good mood.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You'll have to be loud if you want to get her attention.

operators.name: Mr. Nothing
operators.trait: Has reduced Redeployment Time, but DP Cost is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, 3 DP are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)
operators.description: The Yan martial artist, Mr. Nothing, holds back from scarpering and stands guard on the battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He's armed with a parasol, a fan and a mouth. Who can say if he has anything else on him too?

operators.name: Exusiai
operators.description: Exusiai, employee of Penguin Logistics, will clear out everything in the way using her guns.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Is it really fine to trust her with any cargo?

operators.name: Archetto
operators.description: Cleric of Landen Monastery Archetto, the power to rebuild faith stronger than faith itself.
operators.descriptionTagLine: If she pulls you into 'doing your part' for the Monastery, just do what you can.

operators.name: Mudrock
operators.description: Mudrock, Sarkaz mercenary, old friend of the fertile soil and stone.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Many people are astonished by her true appearance, and we're all no different.

operators.name: Eunectes
operators.trait: Only restores SP when blocking enemies
operators.description: Eunectes, Gavial's rival, steps onto the battlefield along with 'the Raging Ironhide.'
operators.descriptionTagLine: She prefers to use machines to solve her problems instead of using her fists.

operators.name: Mountain
operators.description: The unchained jail tiger himself, Mountain, immovable as his name.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You can try it, but you're not taking one step forward.

operators.name: SilverAsh
operators.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
operators.description: SilverAsh, President of Karlan Trade CO., LTD, has signed the contract with Rhodes Island and is ready to join the field.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Let your guard down. There are no traps in the conditions he offers. Well, you won't know even if there is one.

operators.name: Thorns
operators.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
operators.description: Thorns, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, wastes not an ounce of energy, calculating each strike meticulously.
operators.descriptionTagLine: He'll cooperate according to his own interpretation of the commands.

operators.name: Ch'en
operators.description: Ch'en, Special Inspection Unit Chief, L.G.D., is cooperating with Rhodes Island to fulfill the obligations outlined in her contract.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She's terrifying when she's mad, but you don't want to mess with her even when she's not.

operators.name: Siege
operators.description: Siege, leader of the Glasgow Gang, will carve a path for you.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She is a born leader.

operators.name: Bagpipe
operators.trait: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
operators.description: Bagpipe, former Victorian soldier, has come in search of the truth.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Meticulous when it comes to fighting and farming, utterly clueless when it comes to electronics and trends.

operators.name: Ifrit
operators.trait: Deals AOE Arts damage in a long line
operators.description: Ifrit, former test subject of Rhine Lab, will incinerate all of Silence's enemies.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She was born to set things on fire, and it has become a hobby of hers.

operators.name: Mostima
operators.description: Mostima, Senior Messenger, will lay low all obstacles in your path with her Arts.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You'll have to find her first.

operators.name: Shining
operators.description: Shining, Sarkaz healer, will do everything she can to provide medical care for the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Simple, yet a mystery you can't seem to solve no matter what.

operators.name: Nightingale
operators.trait: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously
operators.description: Nightingale, Sarkaz healer, will do everything she can to provide medical care for the squad.
operators.descriptionTagLine: As simple as a blank sheet.

operators.name: Hoshiguma
operators.description: Hoshiguma, member of the Special Service of Lungmen Guard Department, is awaiting your orders.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Stand by her side when you are scared. It really helps.

operators.name: Saria
operators.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
operators.description: Saria, former researcher of Rhine Lab, will serve as a core part of the squad's defense and healing unit on the battlefield.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Diamond is more flexible than she is.

operators.name: Blemishine
operators.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)
operators.description: Blemishine, Kazimierz knight, is the light of glory about to bloom.
operators.descriptionTagLine: If unable to find her, please ask the operators of the Engineering Department.

operators.name: Skadi
operators.description: Skadi, bounty hunter, has come with the tide to drown your enemies.
operators.descriptionTagLine: She's a bit out of her element, literally.

operators.name: Schwarz
operators.description: Schwarz, Operator of Rhodes Island, will protect you from the shadows.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Keep her away from the faint of heart.

operators.name: Hellagur
operators.trait: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers HP every time this operator attacks an enemy
operators.description: Hellagur, the visionary Azazel Guard, is joining you to help you achieve your goals.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Violence should only be used as a last resort, but make sure you're ready to use it.

operators.name: Surtr
operators.description: Rhodes Island Guard Operator Surtr, a person difficult to approach.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Hopefully she will make an exception for the Doctor.

operators.name: Suzuran
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
operators.description: Suzuran, Rhodes Island Operator, has nine times the strength, and the fluffiness.
operators.descriptionTagLine: The mysticism and artistry of Higashi, the freedom and yearning of Siracusa.

operators.name: Magallan
operators.trait: Deals Arts damage and can use Summons in battles
operators.description: Magallan, the Commissioner of Rhine Labs, is glad to welcome new adventures.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Many things can happen when she presses that button, but she swears that explosions aren't one of them.

operators.name: Blaze
operators.description: Blaze, Rhodes Island's most fired-up Operator, will spread her enthusiasm like a wildfire.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Please, it's okay to dial it down a bit...

operators.name: Weedy
operators.trait: Can attack all blocked enemies and can be deployed on Ranged Tiles
operators.description: Weedy, a researcher in Rhodes Island's Bioengineering Department, has set foot on the battlefield after completing her studies.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Be mindful of your appearance when you're in front of her!

operators.name: Aak
operators.description: Aak, Specialist Operator of Rhodes Island, will support other Operators from the rear.
operators.descriptionTagLine: You have the right to operate outside his support range.

operators.name: Ceobe
operators.description: Ceobe is always ready to go after the bad guys.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Knocks 'em down one after another, fast and accurate.

operators.name: Phantom
operators.description: Phantom, Rhodes Island Operator, melts into the night like a shadow.
operators.descriptionTagLine: If you're in a hurry, try calling his code name - he just might appear behind you.

operators.name: Rosa
operators.description: Rosa, a member of the Ursus Student Self-Governing Group, is ready to welcome a new life.
operators.descriptionTagLine: Give her some time.

operators.name: Saga
operators.description: The wandering monk, Saga, joins in on the action wherever she goes.
operators.descriptionTagLine: A heart like lapis. Cleanse the six senses.
